entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Creating linked cancellation tokens hides which token triggered cancellation #78880
  • .NET 7 issue with `IntPtr` when `LangVersion` < 8 #78878
  • Add vectorized code paths to cover 16-byte element sizes (e.g. Span.Fill, MemoryExtensions.IndexOfAnyExcept) #78877
  • [UWP] Cryptography.ProtectedData version 7.0 => System.PlatformNotSupportedException #78875
  • Better support for building SIMD and no-SIMD WebAssembly in the same project #78872
  • dotnet-dotcover ... dotnet run in a blazor wasm project does not cover clientside code #78876
  • [API Proposal]: Dedicated safe `SizeOf` API for layout fixed types #78871
  • ilconformance test for stind.ref doesn't test stind.ref #78867
  • Stack overflow static abstract interface methods, and struct types #78866
  • VerificationException static virtual interface methods, and generic constraints #78865
  • System.InvalidCastException: Arg_InvalidCastException after upgrading blazor webassembly from .net 6 to .net 7 #78864

Closed

  • Process.GetProcessesByName() error on linux #78800
  • System.Text.Json does not fill JsonExtensionData when a property with the same name already exists or has the JsonIgnoreAttribute #68895
    Future
  • The runtime can't load some types with mutual references. #78781
  • DOTNET_SYSTEM_GLOBALIZATION_INVARIANT is not working on linux-alpine base images #77548
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Support GT_SELECT on xarch #78879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow inlining in some over-bugdet cases #78874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experiment with inlining dispatch VSDs #78873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AVX2 support to IndexOfAnyValues #78863
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Fix malformed XML documentation #78868
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution

Updated

  • Update to the stable 7.0.100 SDK (WIP) #78034
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2053694 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Allow inlining for ldsfld + value-type #78736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not overallocate SocketAddress.Buffer #78860
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • JIT: Fold const RVA access (via const index) #78783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][draft] make JSObject dynamic #78853
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ci test #76081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [UWP] Cryptography.ProtectedData version 7.0 => System.PlatformNotSupportedException #29241
  • Cannot run `dotnet watch` on Linux #29223

Updated

  • ProduceReferenceAssembly should exclude exe by default #16193
    8.0.1xx
  • Net 7 sdk build freezes computer #27697
  • BitConverter.GetBytes is incompatible with INumber<T> #29240
  • After Multi-Target 'Net6.0-Windows;Net48' Why am I getting this error NETSDK1073: The FrameworkReference 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App' was not recognized #28859

PullRequests

Updated

  • 'dotnet configure add' command for adding new config to a solution file #29139

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

    Backlog

Closed

  • List pattern indexable requirement binds to this[object] indexer #65521

PullRequests

Merged

    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65619

  • Move "Unseal class" codefix to VerifyCS #65605
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Move `DisambiguateSameVariableTests` to `VerifyCS` #65611
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Move `CSharpUseDefaultLiteralCodeFixProvider` to `VerifyCS` #65617
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change ASP.NET Core Identity incorrect password logging level #45296
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix, fortunes_ef, plaintext #45295
  • blazor wasm publish to IIS has error #45294
  • DisplayNameFor doesn't lookup resx file despite IStringLocalizer and IHtmlLocalizer working correctly in the Razor page #45292
  • gRpc transcoding is not working- unable to find annotation.proto and http.proto are thrown #45287

Closed

  • Blazor (fail: Microsoft.WebAssembly.Diagnostics.DevToolsProxy[0] sending error response for id) #45271
  • a #45290
  • Blazor WASM InteractiveRequestOptions is ignored when deployed to Azure #45289
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #45276

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2053627 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stacklayout leaves layout space for items whose IsVisible=false #11678
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] SearchBar BackgroundColor is black when set to transparent #11677
  • Is `AppDomain.CurrentDomain.ProcessExit` supposed to work on macOS (maccatalyst)? #11676
  • Blazor Maui : "<audio />" tag doesn't show screen lock notification on Android #11675

Closed

  • ContentPage > BackgroundColor attribute not working on Windows #7376

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11671
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • _itemsSource may be null in CarouselViewLoopManager #11000
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
